document.masterDocTitle: A sea of worms: polychaete checklist of the Adriatic Sea

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A sea of worms: polychaete checklist of the Adriatic Sea

subSubSection.paragraph:
LITERATURE
RECORDS
:
Cantone & Di Pietro 2002
;
Castelli et al . 2008
.
NEW
RECORDS
: BM 28 ; along the coast of Puglia (SA) by D. Bedulli (G. Cantone, pers. comm. ). REMARKS : These are the first records from the NA .

OTHER
REPORTED NAMES
:
Lumbrineris fragilis (O.F. Müller, 1776 )
;
Lumbrinereis fragilis (O.F. Müller, 1776 )
;
Lumbriconereis fragilis (O.F. Müller, 1776 )
.

OTHER
REPORTED NAMES
:
Lumbrineris funchalensis (Kinberg, 1865 )
;
Lumbriconereis funchalensis Kinberg, 1865
;
Lumbrinereis funchalensis (Kinberg, 1865 )
.

NEW
RECORDS
: BM 12 , BM 13 , BM 17 , BM 19 , BM 21 , BM 22 , BM 26 , BM 27 , BM 28 , BM 38 , BM 39 , BM 40 , BM 41 , BM 43 , BM 44 , BM 46 , BM 47 , BM 49 , BM 50 , BM 51 , BM 52 , BM 53 , BM 54 , BM 65 , BM 66 , BM 91 , BM 92 , BM 96 , BM 97 , BM 98 , BM 99 , BM 101 .

OTHER
REPORTED NAMES
:
Lumbrineris impatiens Claparède, 1868
;
Lumbriconereis breviceps
Ehlers 1868
;
Lumbriconereis impatiens Claparède, 1868
;
Lumbrinereis impatiens Claparède, 1868
;
Lumbrineris tetraura (Schmarda, 1861 )
;
Lumbrinereis tetraura (Schmarda, 1861 )
;
Scoletoma tetraura (Schmarda, 1861 )
. REMARKS : In European waters
S. impatiens
has been considered a synonym of
S. tetraura (Schmarda, 1861 )
, but without making a revision of both species (
Martins et al . 2012
). Considering that type locality of
S. impatiens
is in the Mediterranean, while
S. tetraura
was described from South Africa ,
Martins et al . ( 2012 )
suggest that
S. tetraura
is not present in Europe, and the name
S. impatiens
should be used instead, for European specimens. However a revision of both species is needed in order to clarify their status. In this checklist records of
S. tetraura
are recorded under
S. impatiens
.

OTHER
REPORTED NAMES
:
Lumbriconereis atlantica Kinberg, 1865
;
Lumbrineris rovignensis (
Fauvel, 1940
)
;
Lumbriconereis rovignensis
Fauvel, 1940
.

REMARKS : This species was recorded for the first time in the Adriatic Sea by
Fauvel ( 1934 )
as
Lumbriconereis atlantica Kinberg, 1865
, due to its similarity with the Atlantic species. Later
Fauvel ( 1940 )
described it as a new taxon,
Lumbriconeris rovignensis
Fauvel 1940
.
